_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Monday, January 19, 2026, 05:00 AM   - Good Morning Skiers and Riders! This is Caitlin with your 5 am snow report for Monday, January 19th. Remember the easiest way to get up to date information is on the Ikon Pass app or website.  
Our Mid mountain base is 27 inches, the temperature is 17 degrees, the winds are 2 miles per hour from the East, with Partly Cloudy skies. 
The Summit base is 41 inches, the temperature is 11 degrees, the winds 14 miles per hour from the NW, with Partly Cloudy skies. 
The base temperature is 24 degrees.  
We will be skiing and riding on 19 lifts, 142 runs, and 2,451 acres on Packed Powder.  
Saddle up, Steamboat its Cowboy Downhill day. Watch cowboys and cowgirls trade horses for skis as they charge down the mountain in one of Ski Town U.S.A.s most legendary traditions, all for a good cause. Stick around for live music, aprs energy, and a full day of Western-style fun on the mountain. Get the full event schedule now at steamboat.com/events. 
Stay in the know with the Ikon Pass App. Find it in the app store on your mobile device and get lift and trail statuses, conditions updates, and more.  
If you are thinking of exploring outside the ski area boundaries, and dont know exactly where you are going, dont go.  
Ski and Ride with Care and we will see you on the mountain!
